title: Luxury Apartment in Negombo
details: AEON SKY changes the skyline of Negombo with the first ever condominium lifestyle luxury living. In the height of pristine in a trouble free environment. 24 hour security and freedom is a platform of your future. Green friendly sky garden and a club house at the roof top, sky pool, a gym facing the sunset and a retro elegant restaurant is a sanctuary for the discerning. The luxury of urban living
